Subsection.Text: Unless exempted, a person may not engage in, or in any manner advertise that they engage in, the selling or issuing of payment instruments or in the activity of a money transmitter, for compensation, without first obtaining a license under this part. For purposes of this section, “compensation” includes profit or loss on the exchange of currency.
A licensee under this part may also engage in the activities authorized under part III of this chapter without the imposition of any additional licensing fees.
